snippet: Madonna's tour will start May 29 in Tel Aviv and ultimately wend its way to the United States, with a stop at Yankee Stadium on Sept. 6.
abstract: Madonna's tour will start May 29 in Tel Aviv and ultimately wend its way to the United States, with a stop at Yankee Stadium on Sept. 6.
lead_paragraph: Madonna will play a show at Yankee Stadium on Sept. 6 as part of her first tour since 2009, Live Nation Entertainment announced Tuesday. The tour will start in Tel Aviv on May 29 and then proceed through Europe and Britain before coming to the United States in August.

headline.main: Reunion With A-Rod? Madonna to Play at Yankee Stadium
